content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule a visit for HVAC, plumbing, or electrical issues. Can I get your full name to get started?
Hey, I think Iâ€™m gonna try and fix my AC myself for now. Can you cancel?
No problem! If you change your mind or need professional help, feel free to reach out anytime. Good luck with your AC!
reason: Customer decided to attempt repair themselves.
